IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: AN EDUCATIONAL ORGANIZATION WHICH CONDUCTS RESEARCH,INFORMS AND EDUCATES THE PUBLIC ON VARIOUS NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL ISSUES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: AN EDUCATIONAL ORGANIZATION, WHICH CONDUCTS RESEARCH, INFORMS AND EDUCATES THE PUBLIC ON VARIOUS NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL ISSUES.
IRS990.Desc: TRADITIONAL VALUES PROGRAM: RESEARCH, PUBLICATION AND PUBLIC DISTRIBUTION OF EDUCATIONAL MATERIALS IN DEFENSE OF TRADITIONAL AMERICAN VALUES AND THE INSTITUTIONS THAT SUPPORT AND PROMOTE SUCH VALUES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: CITIZENS UNITED FOUNDATION PRODUCTIONS: PRODUCE, DISTRIBUTE AND MARKET EDUCATIONAL DOCUMENTARY FILMS FOCUSING ON CONTEMPORARY DOMESTIC AND INTERNATIONAL ISSUES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: LEGAL AND JUDICIAL ACTION PROGRAMS: RESEARCH, PUBLICATION AND PUBLIC DISTRIBUTION OF EDUCATIONAL MATERIALS RELATING TO THE AMERICAN COURT SYSTEM, LEGAL RESEARCH AND LITIGATION SUPORT IN DEFENSE OF HUMAN AND CIVIL RIGHTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MANAGEMENT HAS EVALUATED THE TAX POSITIONS TAKEN ON THE FORM 990 RETURNS OF CITIZENS UNITED FOUNDATION AND CONCLUDED THAT THE ORGANIZATION HAS TAKEN NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT REQUIRE ADJUSTMENT TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE FORM 990 FILINGS OF CUF ARE SUBJECT TO AUDIT BY THE VARIOUS TAXING AUTHORITIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IN ADDITION TO PROVIDING A COPY TO EACH BOARD MEMBER FOR REVIEW PRIOR TO FILING, THE 2021 FORM 990 WAS REVIEWED BY THE ORGANIZATION'S GENERAL COUNSEL AND ITS OUTSIDE LEGAL COUNSEL BEFORE IT WAS FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CITIZENS UNITED FOUNDATION FOLLOWS THE REQUIREMENTS OF THE VIRGINIA NON-STOCK CORPORATION ACT WITH RESPECT TO TRANSACTIONS INVOLVING POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST. THE ORGANIZATION'S IN-HOUSE COUNSEL MONITORS TRANSACTIONS THAT MAY INVOLVE POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST AND DIRECTORS ARE REMINDED DURING BOARD MEETINGS OF THEIR DUTY TO DISCLOSE POTENTIAL CONFLICTS, AND TO RECUSE THEMSELVES FROM MATTERS INVOLVING THEIR PERSONAL INTERESTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMPENSATION FOR THE TOP OFFICIAL IS DETERMINED BY A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE OF INDEPENDENT DIRECTORS. THE PROCESS INVOLVES THE USE OF COMPARABLE COMPENSATION DATA AND OTHER INFORMATION, WHICH IS DOCUMENTED IN THE MINUTES OF THE COMMITTEE'S MEETINGS. THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE LAST MET IN DECEMBER 2019.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CITIZENS UNITED FOUNDATION DOES NOT GENERALLY MAKE ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC. HOWEVER, THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART X, BALANCE SHEET, LINES 27 AND 28
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CHANGED ALLOCATION BETWEEN "NET ASSETS WITHOUT DONOR RESTRICTIONS AND "NET ASSETS WITH DONOR RESTRICTION" TO MORE ACCURATELY REPORT GRANT ALLOCATION TOTALS AT YEAR END.
